Name: Andrew Kozak
AboutMe:
" Winners Never Lose. "

Andrew Kozak (@andrewkozak) was born and raised at the Jersey Shore although his fair skin wouldn't give that away.  He is conversant in most modern technologies, has been programming since the third grade, remembers life before HTML had a version number, and prefers the hose for chasing kids off his lawn.  He enjoys writing and is an outspoken advocate of English spacing, Oxford commas , and Roman quotes.  Andrew also enjoys traveling, Olympic lifting, and studying a variety of subjects.  When not in front of a screen or under a bar, he practices calligraphy, occasionally judges costuming competitions, and continues to work on speaking as many languages as he feels he should.
